column4: can anybody help with my pppoe problems under breezy? I have already searched the forums and google for breezy dsl-provider pppoe and found some pointers but none similar to my problem...
whats the prob?
in particular plugin rp-pppoe.so ath0
when u run sudo pppeconf what do u get?
it finds the pppoe concentrator on the ath0 device
i answer all the questions and creates the dsl-provider file
it creates the files, and when u reboot it doesnt connect?
no, the problem is that pppoe does not put a newline between plugin rp-pppoe.so and the ath0 device
is this wireless stuff?
yes
mad-wifi
atheros AR5212
netgear?
conceptronics
weird i thought ubuntu detected atheros
it does detect it, it pings other hosts, it finds the pppoe access concentrator but
it was not setup automatically (I had to fudge with /etc/network/interfaces to make it work in kubuntu)
pppd does not like it...
and http://www.linux-wireless.org/Drivers/
hell no man, mad-wifi drivers work perfectly!
this is a ubuntu-specific problem....
hi, in the end, I filed a bug for pppoeconf
